                                                                          java.lang.String fieldName)
        Get the data field information for a specified owner and field from the project's field information list
        Parameters:
        ownerName - name of the data field owner (table name, including the path if this table references a structure, group name, or table type name)
        fieldName - name of the field for which to get the field information (case insensitive)
        Returns:
        Reference to the data field information for the specified field; null if the field doesn't exist

                                                                               CcddClassesDataTable.InputType inputType)
        Get the data field information for a specified owner and input type. The first field matching the input type is returned
        Parameters:
        ownerName - name of the data field owner (table name, including the path if this table references a structure, group name, or table type name)
        inputType - input type of the field for which to get the field information (InputType)
        Returns:
        Reference to the data field information for the first field that matches the owner and input type; null if the no match is found

      • isFieldApplicable

        protected boolean isFieldApplicable(java.lang.String ownerName,
                                    java.lang.String applicability,
                                    java.lang.Boolean isRootStruct)
        Determine if a field is applicable to the specified owner. A field is always applicable if the specified applicability is for all tables, or if the owner is a table type or group. If the owner is a root table then 'child only' fields are inapplicable. If the table doesn't meet any of the previous criteria then the table is a child table or the prototype for a child table, so 'root only' fields are inapplicable
        Parameters:
        ownerName - name of the data field owner (table name, including the path if this table references a structure, group name, or table type name)
        applicability - one of the ApplicabilityType names; a blank is treated the same as being applicable for all tables
        isRootStruct - true if the owner is a root structure table; null to obtain the root structure status from the list maintained in the database table handler
        Returns:
        true if the field is applicable to the owner

      • isFieldChanged

        protected boolean isFieldChanged(java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.FieldInformation> compFieldInfoA,
                                 java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.FieldInformation> compFieldInfoB,
                                 boolean isIgnoreOwnerName)
        Determine if the number of data fields, field attributes, or field contents differ between two sets of data field information
        Parameters:
        compFieldInfoA - reference to the the first data field information with which to compare the second data field information
        compFieldInfoB - reference to the second data field information with which to compare the first data field information
        isIgnoreOwnerName - true if the owner name is ignored. This is the case if called by the data field or table type editors
        Returns:
        Data field definitions array

      • getFieldInformationFromData

        protected java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.FieldInformation> getFieldInformationFromData(java.lang.Object[][] fieldData,
                                                                                            java.lang.String ownerName)
        Rebuild the data field definitions for the specified owner from the supplied data field editor data. The owner's existing fields (if any) are removed, then the supplied definitions are used to create the owner's new fields (if any)
        Parameters:
        fieldData - array of data field editor data
        ownerName - name of the data field owner (table name, including the path if this table references a structure, group name, or table type name)
        Returns:
        List of data field information created from the supplied field definitions

      • getFieldEditorDefinition

        protected static java.lang.Object[][] getFieldEditorDefinition(java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.FieldInformation> fieldInfo)
        Get the array of data field definitions from the supplied field information list for use in the data field editor
        Parameters:
        fieldInfo - list of field information to convert
        Returns:
        Object array containing the data field definitions for the specified owner used by the data field editor

      • getFieldDefnsFromInfo

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> getFieldDefnsFromInfo()
        Get the list of all data field definitions from the field information
        Returns:
        String list containing all of the data field definitions

      • getFieldDefinitionArray

        protected static java.lang.String[] getFieldDefinitionArray(java.lang.String ownerName,
                                                            java.lang.String fieldName,
                                                            java.lang.String description,
                                                            CcddClassesDataTable.InputType inputType,
                                                            int size,
                                                            boolean isRequired,
                                                            CcddConstants.ApplicabilityType applicability,
                                                            java.lang.String value,
                                                            boolean isInherited)
        Create a field definition array from the supplied inputs
        Parameters:
        ownerName - name of the table/table type/group to which the field is a member
        fieldName - name of the new field
        description - field description
        inputType - input type (InputType)
        size - field display size in characters
        isRequired - true if a value if required in this field
        applicability - ApplicabilityType.ALL to indicate all tables, ApplicabilityType.ROOTS_ONLY for root tables only, or ApplicabilityType.CHILD_ONLY for child tables only
        value - data field value
        isInherited - true if the field is inherited from a table type definition
        Returns:
        Field definition array created from the supplied inputs

      • updateField

        protected boolean updateField(CcddClassesDataTable.FieldInformation updateInfo)
        Update an existing data field's information
        Parameters:
        updateInfo - updated field information used to replace the existing field information
        Returns:
        true if the a matching owner and field exists for the provided field information update

      • addUpdateInheritedField

        protected void addUpdateInheritedField(java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.FieldInformation> fieldInformationList,
                                       java.lang.String tablePath,
                                       CcddClassesDataTable.FieldInformation typeFldInfo)
        Check the supplied field information list for the specified inheritable (table type) data field belonging to the specified table. If the table does not have the field then add it; otherwise update the table's field to ensure it matches the one inherited from its table type (and that no duplicate field name arises from an existing table field of the same name but different input type)
        Parameters:
        fieldInformationList - list of data field information to search
        tablePath - name of the table (including the path if this table represents a structure) for the table owning the field
        typeFldInfo - reference to the table type data field

      • alterFieldName

        protected static java.lang.String alterFieldName(java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.FieldInformation> fieldInformationList,
                                                 java.lang.String ownerName,
                                                 java.lang.String matchName)
        Alter an owner's existing field's name so that it doesn't match the supplied name in the supplied field information list. This can be used when a table inherits a field from its table type definition to prevent a duplicate field name
        Parameters:
        fieldInformationList - list of data field information to search
        ownerName - name of the data field owner (table name, including the path if this table references a structure, group name, or table type name) from which to copy the data fields
        matchName - field name to use when matching with an existing field for the specified owner
        Returns:
        The field name, updated to be unique by adding one or more trailing underscores

      • checkForDuplicateField

        protected boolean checkForDuplicateField(java.util.List<java.lang.String> tablesOfType,
                                         java.lang.String typeFieldName,
                                         java.lang.String inputType)
        Check if a table already has a field with the specified default field name, but a different input type
        Parameters:
        tablesOfType - list of tables of the table type containing the default field
        typeFieldName - default data field name
        inputType - input type name for the default field
        Returns:
        true if a table in the list has a data field with the same name but a different input type

      • copyFields

        protected void copyFields(java.lang.String ownerName,
                          java.lang.String newName)
        Copy the data fields belonging to the specified owner to another table, group, etc.
        Parameters:
        ownerName - name of the data field owner (table name, including the path if this table references a structure, group name, or table type name) from which to copy the data fields
        newName - name of the table, group, etc. to which to copy the data fields
